game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to quest giver.
game.description: Rumored to be hidden in the depths of the jungle, a lost artifact holds great power. Retrieve it and bring it back to its rightful owner.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a rare magical item

task.description: You must venture into the dark jungle and navigate its treacherous paths.
Solve the riddles left by ancient tribes to uncover the artifact's exact location.
task.location: Jungle of Shadows, Heart of the Wild

task.description: Battle the guardians and claim the artifact before making your way back.
